312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (06:17): unless you mean, it Just Works if you don't try to do anything aside from the defaults

2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:23): why must EVERY new package i get have to have an interactive or weird setup ?!
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:24): lisa: cause you've got mad expect skills.
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:24): so how's ccache working?
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:24): behaving now
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:24): lisa: still is a bug imo.
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:24): and what is expect?
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:24): ferringb: does it fail on other packages?
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:24): if it can't find the appropriate compiler... printing "Success" === stupid as all hell
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:25): nah, it's a setup issue
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:25): *cough* I was aparently *reeeeeaaaaaaalllllllly* cracked out when I rewrote the ccache/distcc support
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:25): lol

74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:25): been cleaning out the rats nest of idiocy in that for the last day or so, pretty amazed how bad it (everything else around it is pretty good, but that chunk is just horrid)
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:26): nerdboy: please do so, and don't give it back
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:26): wasted quite a few hours chasing the tail on that one :/
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:26): lisa: re: expect, language designed for automating interactive crap
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:26): ferringb: URL?
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:26): emerge -pv expect
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:26): that isn't a URL
312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (07:27): emerge --search expect
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:27): that's not a URL either ;)
312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (07:27): but it would give you one!
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:27): pquery '*/expect' --max --attr homepage # :P
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:27): that is also not a URL :P
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:27): also is an exception (shit)
312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (07:27): www.google.com/?expect
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:28): hah... figures, not exposing that...
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:28): dev-tcltk/expect ? http://expect.nist.gov/ ?
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:28): anyone got a better name for homepage style metadata besides 'homepage' ?
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:28): upstream maybe, but that's kinda sucky...
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:28): ferringb: *blink* what's wrong with homepage?
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:29): lisa: dunno... just seems too specific
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:30): ferringb: what do you want? it's *FOR* a homepage
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:30): stop making things difficult :P
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:30): lisa: yeah, but that type of metadata, alternative exist :P
d2fa39370031d970993172293b9027fe (07:30): shorter = less wasted cache/mem/disk/resources. translates to faster loading.
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:30): no, not really
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:31): so you're finding lots of homepages on gopher these days? ;)
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:31): solar: api name != actual metadata key used for the format
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:31): just is the attrib name in this case
d2fa39370031d970993172293b9027fe (07:31): then lisa seems right. it's a homepage after all.
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:32): well, just kinda bugs me having maintainer, homepage, etc.
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (07:32): seems like it can be rolled together in some way
2abafdd6fabba43e49dd808e54d5f6bc (07:32): ferringb: try a foreign language
